docstring: This data model describes a COF preparation including information about chemical entities and the experimental procedure. Preliminary specifications according to the example PDF provided.

products.description: List of products resulting from the COF preparation

reactants.description: List of reagents that were used in the COF preparation

solvents.description: List of solvents that were used in the COF preparation

procedures.description: List of procedures that were applied to the COF preparation

observations.description: Free text for noting observations during the COF preparation

analyses.description: Analyses that were performed for the COF preparation

Report.docstring: Defines a COF preparation by the products, reactants, reagents, and solvents used, as well as the experimental procedure itself. Preliminary specification according to the example PDF provided.

inchi.description: InChI code that uniquely identifies the structure of a molecule

cas_number.description: A CAS Registry Number also referred to as CAS RN or informally CAS Number, is a unique numerical identifier assigned by the Chemical Abstracts Service (CAS), US to every chemical substance described in the open scientific literature.

amount.description: Amount of the quantity of compound (numerical value)

unit.description: Unit of the quantity of compound (SI unit)

Compound.docstring: Describes a chemical compound. Preliminary specification according to the example PDF provided.

name.description: Descriptive name of the method (e.g. work-up)

steps.description: Independent steps that make up the procedure

reference.description: Reference to the original publication from which the method was adapted from.

Procedure.docstring: Describes a procedure that was applied for a particular part of the COF preparation or the preparation as whole. Preliminary specification according to the example PDF provided.

description.description: Free text description of the step

Step.docstring: Describes a part of a procedure through free text and optionally an associated analysis. Preliminary specification according to the example PDF provided.

location.description: Location were the results of the analysis can be retrieved

Analysis.docstring: Describes an anlysis that was performed for the COF preparation. Preliminary specification according to the example PDF provided.
